short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch NBA games in theatre mode, makes the NBA league pass viewing experience not suck.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey you! Do you use NBA League pass? Tired of staring at a mini video player and surrounding ads? Want a 70% larger (reviewed by scientists) video with a sleek black background? 

Upgrade your League pass viewing experience with NBA Theatre today!


"It's proper wow good! I simply couldn't go back. If you have NBA League pass and you don't use NBA Theatre then you're next." ~ Vladimir Putin
